text:
In collaboration with Nuclear Power Corporation of India Limited, the Tamil Nadu Science and Technology Centre (TNSTC) is setting up a nuclear lab that is dedicated to the general public, at Birla Planetarium.

The lab will be thrown open for the public next month. The work on setting up the lab was started two years ago.

“The gallery will throw light on how nuclear energy is useful for society, especially generation of electricity through nuclear energy. The generation of electricity through nuclear energy reduces the amount of energy generated from fossil fuels. Less use of fossil fuels means lowering greenhouse gas emissions.
title: Nuclear lab to come up at Birla Planetarium
